name: Nightfall (itch) (Kuren Studio)
description:
A game from Kuren Studio.

Explore a wild and lively forest. Gather all your strength and go through the wild forest under the gaze of the furtive hunters until you reach the natural reserve.

  • It is an adventure and puzzle game in 3D graphics based on the player's experience of getting into the skin of an owl that lives under the threat of hunters.
  • The forest is full of dangers, it is in your hands to help the barn owl not to be captured.
  • Enlist the help of your partner to distract predators. The goal is to return to the nest where the barn owl cubs are found.
